sense.gloss: outpatient, outpatient care, outpatient clinic, outpatient ward

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は|↑外来|↑↓がいらい↓↑思想↑↓しそう↓に↑偏見↑↓へんけん↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いているようだ。
sdata.e: You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓の↑日本語↑↓にほんご↓って、|↑外来|↑↓がいらい↓↑語↑↓ご↓が↑多↑↓おお↓いよね。
sdata.e: Modern Japanese has a lot of foreign words.
